item.title: And We're Off!
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: (click the title to see the full post, not just this preview) Welcome! I don’t know how you found this page, but if you did, more power to you. Check your Carleton email account for a note from me about getting started in the class. There are no zoom meetings in this class (balloons, confetti, streamers fall from ceiling, much rejoicing, etc). There is a discord server for a class social space and for video, audio chat & screensharing (which is useful when things go wrong and you want someone to look at what you’re doing).
